sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import ProjectService from '../service/ProjectService.jsx' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Badge from 'react-bootstrap/Badge' class UnitComponent extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { unit: '', overview: '', loadInList: [], buildList: [], materials: [], owner: this.props.location.state.owner, projectId: this.props.match.params.id } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) } handleChange(event) { this.setState( {[event.target.name]: event.target.value} ) } componentDidMount() { this.refreshUnit(); } refreshUnit() { ProjectService.retrieveUnit(this.props.location.state.unitId, this.state.projectId) .then( response => { this.setState({ unit: response.data }) this.setState({ loadInList: response.data.subcomponents.filter(subcom => subcom.type === "LOAD_IN")}) this.setState({ buildList: response.data.subcomponents.filter(subcom => subcom.type === "BUILD")}) this.setState({ materials: response.data.materials }) this.setState({ overview: response.data.unitOverview }) } ) } deleteUnitClicked() { ProjectService .deleteUnit(this.state.unit.id, this.state.projectId) .then((response) => { if (response.data.success) { console.log("unit was deleted successfully") this.props.history.goBack() } else { console.log("unit was not deleted succuessfully") } }).catch(() => { console.log("unit delete failed") }) } markAllFinishedClicked() { console.log("mark all complete clicked") ProjectService .markAllSubcomponentsComplete(true, this.state.unit.id) .then((response) => { if (response.data.success) { console.log("Marked all subcomponents complete") this.refreshUnit() this.props.history.goBack() } else { console.log("Marking all subcomponents complete was not successful") } }).catch(() => { console.log("Mark all complete failed") }) } render() { return (

{this.state.unit.name}

{this.state.owner ? ( ) : ( )}

Description

{this.state.unit.description}

Build Totals
Total Build Cost: ${this.state.overview.buildSubtotal} 15% Contingency: ${Number((this.state.overview.build - this.state.overview.buildSubtotal).toFixed(2))} Build Total: ${this.state.overview.build}
Load In Totals
Total Load In Cost: ${this.state.overview.loadInSubtotal} 15% Contingency: ${Number((this.state.overview.loadIn - this.state.overview.loadInSubtotal).toFixed(2))} Build Total: ${this.state.overview.loadIn}
Build Totals
Total Load In Cost: ${this.state.overview.materialsSubtotal} 15% Contingency: ${Number((this.state.overview.materials - this.state.overview.materialsSubtotal).toFixed(2))} Build Total: ${this.state.overview.materials}

Build

{this.state.buildList.map( build => {/* Todo */} {build.name} {/* */} {build.description} {/* */} Work Hours: {build.workHours} Crew: {build.numberOfCrew} Total: {build.workHours * build.numberOfCrew} Status: {build.finished ? (Done) : (Todo)} {build.finished ? () : ()} ) }

Load in

{this.state.loadInList.map( loadIn => {loadIn.name} {loadIn.description} Work Hours: {loadIn.workHours} Crew: {loadIn.numberOfCrew} Total: {loadIn.workHours * loadIn.numberOfCrew} {loadIn.finished ? () : ()} ) }

Materials

{this.state.materials.map( material => {material.name} Cost: {material.cost} Amount: {material.amountRequired} Total: {material.cost * material.amountRequired} {material.finished ? () : ()} ) }

) } } export default UnitComponent
